thread.title: Brothers Take MT Elk Bulls Down on Public Land
thread.title_full: Brothers Take MT Elk Bulls Down on Public Land

author: angelamontana
title: Brothers Take MT Elk Bulls Down on Public Land
text:
Jared Schultz from Stevensville bagged an impressive 360+ bull in the Bitterroot Valley. Just another reminder that when you put in the effort, big bulls and bucks are out there waiting! Huge congrats, Jared!
And the Schultz family success continues—Jared’s brother Nate also scored a solid bull last week while hunting deep in Grizzly Country in the Gallatin Range. This one came with a standout whale tail on one side. The Schultz brothers prove once again that hard work pays off, especially on public land!
